gw.wsi.pl

Class TypelistToolsAPI

  • gw.wsi.pl.TypelistToolsAPI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class TypelistToolsAPI
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    ITypelistToolsAPI provides methods that allow for the extraction of typelist data from the system.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        IntrinsicType

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TypelistToolsAPI()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAliasByInternalCode(String typelist, String namespace, String code)
      For use during exports, returns a string corresponding to an alias to an internal typecode given a typelist, a namespace, and an internal code. If no match is found, returns null. If more than one match is found, throws an IllegalArgumentException.
      String[] getAliasesByInternalCode(String typelist, String namespace, String code)
      For use during exports, returns an array of strings representing external aliases to internal typecodes given a typelist, a namespace, and an internal code. If no aliases are found, then a zero-length, non-null array is returned. A namespace generally corresponds to an external integration source, but multiple namespaces per source are allowed. NOTE: this method allows multiple aliases to correspond to the same namespace-typecode tuple. If you require a namespace-typecode to resolve to a single alias, please use getAliasByInternalCode.
      TypeKeyData getTypeKeyByAlias(String typelist, String namespace, String alias)
      For use during imports, returns a TypeKeyData instance corresponding to a typecode in the given typelist that matches the given namespace/alias. If no match is found, returns null. If more than one match is found, throws an IllegalArgumentException.
      TypeKeyData[] getTypeKeysByAlias(String typelist, String namespace, String alias)
      For use during imports, returns an array of TypeKeyData objects given a typelist, a namespace, and an alias. If no typecodes are found, will return a zero-length, non-null array. A namespace generally corresponds to an external integration source, but multiple namespaces per source are allowed. NOTE: this method allows multiple typecodes to use the same namespace-alias tuple. If you require a namespace-alias to resolve to a single typecode, please use getTypeKeyByAlias.
      TypeKeyData[] getTypelistValues(String typelist)
      Given the name of a typelist, returns an array of all the typekey instances contained within. An exception is thrown if no typelist exists with the given name.

      • Methods inherited from class _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getTypelistValues

        TypeKeyData[] getTypelistValues(String typelist)
        Given the name of a typelist, returns an array of all the typekey instances contained within. An exception is thrown if no typelist exists with the given name.
        Parameters:
        typelist -
        Returns:
        an array of codes of typekeys contained within the typelist

      • getTypeKeysByAlias

        TypeKeyData[] getTypeKeysByAlias(String typelist,
                               String namespace,
                               String alias)
        For use during imports, returns an array of TypeKeyData objects given a typelist, a namespace, and an alias. If no typecodes are found, will return a zero-length, non-null array. A namespace generally corresponds to an external integration source, but multiple namespaces per source are allowed. NOTE: this method allows multiple typecodes to use the same namespace-alias tuple. If you require a namespace-alias to resolve to a single typecode, please use getTypeKeyByAlias.
        Parameters:
        typelist - the name of the given typelist (case-insensitive)
        namespace - the given namespace (case-insensitive)
        alias - the given alias (case-insensitive)
        Returns:
        array of TypeKeyData objects, or a zero-length, non-null string array if no typecodes match

      • getTypeKeyByAlias

        TypeKeyData getTypeKeyByAlias(String typelist,
                            String namespace,
                            String alias)
        For use during imports, returns a TypeKeyData instance corresponding to a typecode in the given typelist that matches the given namespace/alias. If no match is found, returns null. If more than one match is found, throws an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        typelist - the name of the given typelist (case-insensitive)
        namespace - the given namespace (case-insensitive)
        alias - the given alias (case-insensitive)
        Returns:
        TypeKeyData instance corresponding to a typecode; null if no match found

      • getAliasesByInternalCode

        String[] getAliasesByInternalCode(String typelist,
                                String namespace,
                                String code)
        For use during exports, returns an array of strings representing external aliases to internal typecodes given a typelist, a namespace, and an internal code. If no aliases are found, then a zero-length, non-null array is returned. A namespace generally corresponds to an external integration source, but multiple namespaces per source are allowed. NOTE: this method allows multiple aliases to correspond to the same namespace-typecode tuple. If you require a namespace-typecode to resolve to a single alias, please use getAliasByInternalCode.
        Parameters:
        typelist - the name of the given typelist (case-insensitive)
        namespace - the given namespace (case-insensitive)
        code - the given typecode (case-insensitive)
        Returns:
        string array of aliases, or a zero-length, non-null string array if no aliases match

      • getAliasByInternalCode

        String getAliasByInternalCode(String typelist,
                            String namespace,
                            String code)
        For use during exports, returns a string corresponding to an alias to an internal typecode given a typelist, a namespace, and an internal code. If no match is found, returns null. If more than one match is found, throws an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        typelist - the name of the given typelist (case-insensitive)
        namespace - the given namespace (case-insensitive)
        code - the given typecode (case-insensitive)
        Returns:
        string corresponding to a typecode; null if no match found
